slider.text: I love nature, I like traveling, going out to explore and visiting new places. I am learning to play the piano in my spare time, I consider music is an essential part of someone who spends a lot of time in front of a computer, so why not get to know it a little more.

I am a technology lover and curious about the new tech trends that are available and although there are many that I still do not know, I like to be surprised at what it can offer me and see all the possibilities in which I can apply it.
